original_title: A different scene this New Year’s Eve! 2024
original_body_lines: It’s certainly going to be a big scene this 31st night and the good news is that the entertainment, connected with New Year’s Eve, will not be confined only to the city of Colombo – it’s happening everywhere….
However, one wonders whether the kind of sameness will prevail at most of these 31st night dances!
Perhaps, one may get an overdose of baila at most of these 31st happenings.
But, there are venues that still prefer to do it differently
The Mount Lavinia Hotel, for example, has come up with a spectacular event, to usher in 2024, creating an atmosphere reminiscent of the vibrant Brazilian carnival.
Under the theme ‘A Night In Copacabana,’ this renowned hotel aims to transport its guests to the heart of Brazil, making for an unforgettable evening.
Brazilian carnival girls to add excitement at the Mount Lavinia Hotel
Patrons will be escorted to the premises with the sensual dancing of show girls to fabricate a kindred notion of a Gala at The Palace of Copacabana in Rio de Janeiro.
This themed 31st Night is, indeed, an exclusive experience in Sri Lanka, born under the guidance of the MLH’s Chief Operating Officer Anura Dewapura.
Since Dewapura shares an ample amount of knowledge and encounters of New Year’s Eve Celebrations around the world, ‘A Night in Copacabana’ will, no doubt, be an exotic evening.
MLH’s Chief Operating Officer Anura Dewapura … shares an ample amount of knowledge and encounters of New Year’s Eve Celebrations around the world

The Terrace of the Mount Lavinia Hotel, I’m told, will be transformed into a Brazilian paradise and the hotel has planned an array of artistic and creative acts that will immerse guests in the true spirit of the carnival.
Taking centre stage, at this gala New Year’s Eve event, will be the band FREEZE and, with their energetic performances and captivating music, FREEZE is sure to keep the guests dancing till dawn.
DJ Delo will be supporting the live performances throughout the night, ensuring a continuous flow of music that will keep the dance floor alive and vibrant.
In addition, live Jazz will be played, creating a delightful blend of different genres and adding a touch of sophistication to the evening.
To further enhance the Brazilian spirit, samba percussion instrument players will be present, infusing the atmosphere with infectious rhythms.
Guests can expect a sensory experience as the beat of the drums resonates and inspires them to dance along.
Adding to the authenticity, Brazilian carnival girls, adorned in sequins and feathers, will enthrall the crowd with their captivating dances.
One of the highlights of the evening will, no doubt, be the breathtaking fireworks display that will last for an entire hour.
Yes, the Mount Lavinia Hotel is certainly doing it differently…to usher in 2024.
